com.slightlyloony.blog.users

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.slightlyloony.blog.objects.BlogObject
      • com.slightlyloony.blog.objects.BlogObjectObject

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImmutableUser

    public class User
extends BlogObjectObject
    Represents a blog user.
    Author:
    Tom Dilatush tom@dilatush.com

      • create

        public static User create(java.lang.String _username,
                          java.lang.String _blog,
                          java.lang.String _passwordHashedAndSalted)
                   throws StorageException
        Creates a new instance of this class with the given parameters, and persists it.
        Parameters:
        _username - the new user's username
        _blog - the blog that the new user belongs to
        _passwordHashedAndSalted - the new user's hashed and salted password
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • fromJSON

        public static User fromJSON(java.lang.String _json)
                     throws StorageException
        Creates a new instance of this class by deserializing the given JSON data.
        Parameters:
        _json - the JSON representation of the user object to instantiate
        Returns:
        the new user object
        Throws:
        StorageException - on any problem

        public boolean passwordOK(java.lang.String _password)
        Returns true if the hash of the given password matches the hashed and salted password stored in this instance.
        Parameters:
        _password - the password to check (in plaintext)
        Returns:
        true if the given password matches the stored password
